description:
Description


A OTC-certified physical type sunscreen with broad spectrum of SPF50 infused with professional ingredients and technology to protect your skin from harmful UV rays.
Enriched with Hyaluronic Acid and 17% Zinc Oxide to deeply moisturize your skin while providing strong protection against UV rays.
Formulated with a non-nano sunscreen mechanism that offers excellent application and enhanced safety while preventing the sunscreen from penetrating the skin.
With a soft and creamy texture that is non-sticky, which is suitable for all skin types.

Apply a moderate amount on the face and spread evenly to ensure no white residue is left.

description:
Description


[ The Smoothest, Lightest Sunscreen ] A daily SPF 50 Korean sunscreen with an ultra-smooth, gliding texture that absorbs instantly. The lightweight, oil-free formula hydrates while shielding your skin against UVA & UVB rays—leaving a naturally radiant finish without heaviness or stickiness.
[ Broad-Spectrum UV Protection ] Formulated to protect against both UVA and UVB rays, this advanced SPF 50 sunscreen offers strong, broad-spectrum UV defense, clinically tested and confirmed by Florida Suncare Testing, Inc.
[ No White Cast ] Designed for all skin tones, this sunscreen absorbs seamlessly with zero white cast. The breathable, non-greasy texture glides on smoothly, keeping skin fresh and comfortable.
[ Triple-Tested for Skin Safety ] Clinically tested for skin irritation, non-comedogenic properties, and hypoallergenic formulation. A gentle, non-pore-clogging sunscreen suitable for all skin types, including sensitive and FA skin.
[ Makeup-Friendly Sunscreen ] This makeup-friendly sunscreen defends against UV-induced damage while supporting skin vitality and radiance. The oil-free, lightweight formula layers effortlessly under makeup.

What does OTC Certification mean?
OTC stands for Over-the-Counter, a designation by the U.S. FDA for non-prescription drugs that can be sold in pharmacies and general retail stores. Sun Day Adventure Sunscreen SPF 50 is formulated with ingredients that meet the strict standards of the U.S. FDA’s OTC regulations. It has been rigorously tested and registered for its sun protection efficacy. Additionally, it has passed Broad Spectrum SPF testing, ensuring comprehensive protection against both UVA and UVB rays.

Can I use this sunscreen on children?
Sun Day Adventure Sunscreen SPF 50 is made with FDA-approved UV filters and has undergone three types of skin irritation tests on adults. However, as children's skin can be more sensitive, we recommend conducting a patch test before use and consulting with a healthcare professional for personalized guidance.
 
How To Use

Effective Sunscreen Application
Apply evenly to the face, neck, and back of hands about 15 minutes before sun exposure.

Glowing Broad-Spectrum Protection
Use it as the final step in your skincare routine to experience powerful sun protection along with a natural glow. Our hydrating, non-greasy formula delivers a radiant finish without a white cast.
 
Key Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Dipropylene Glycol, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspoly- mer, Glyceryl Polymethacrylate, Propylene Glycol, Acrylates Copo- lymer, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Ceteareth-20, Ethylhexyl Methoxy- crylene, Polysorbate 60, Sorbitan Stearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Ce- tearyl Olivate, Panthenol, Sorbitan Olivate, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tromethamine, Sodium Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, 1,2-Hexane- diol, Isohexadecane, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/VP Co- polymer, BHT, Butylene Glycol, Polysorbate 80, Trisodium Eth- ylenediamine Disuccinate, Sorbitan Oleate, Xanthan Gum, Oenan- the Javanica Extract 
Hanjae Minari (Water Parsley)
Grown in the pure underground waters flowing from Mount Hwaak at an elevation of 932m, Cheongdo Hanjae Minari (Water Parsley) is enriched with natural properties that support skin vitality. This unique ingredient helps shield your skin from the effects of UV exposure while delivering a soft, daily touch that nurtures and revitalizes your skin, leaving it looking healthy and radiant.

Panthenol
A high concentration of Panthenol, which converts to vitamin B5 when absorbed into the skin, helps to strengthen the moisture barrier by improving water retention and hydration.

※ The above description is limited to raw material characteristics.

Active Ingredients
Avobenzone 3.0%
Homosalate 9.0%
Octisalate 4.5%
Octocrylene 5.0%

reviews.title: Wouldn't touch this with a four foot pole
reviews.content:
I had high hopes for this sunscreen since it was a korean made so I thought it might has modern uv filters as they are not really listed anywhere on the page but this sunscreen includes Avobenzone, Homosalate, Octisalate, and Octocrylene—which are all old basic filters easily available in drug stores in the US. This is just a shill of a product that charges extra money to be korean, better to buy drugstore US brands with same filters

The texture felt heavy and greasy, especially on my super dry. It never really absorbed and left a shiny film on my face. Worst of all, it irritated my skin and eyes, causing stinging within minutes of application. my skin is pretty no reactive (I apply tret on damp skin), so this was disappointing.

It says there is no fragrance here but I pick up this awful scent that lingered way too long, which made it even harder to wear. I really wanted to like this for its ingredients, but performance-wise, it's a complete miss for me.

 

Would not repurchase. There are much better options out there that protect just as well without the irritation or greasy feel.

description:
Description

Even on overcast days or indoors, UV rays can damage your skin and speed up aging. House of Hur's light weight, powerful sunscreen protects against daily environmental stress while its non-greasy texture ensures effortless application.
Embrace healthy skin - start today.

Point 1 - Silky & smooth texture
Experience an ultra-light, silky texture that glides over your skin effortlessly.
It absorbs quickly without any sticky residue, delivering a refreshing burst of hydration that's ideal for daily sun protection.

Point2 - Hydration powered by 7 tropical fruits
Infused with extracts from seven tropical fruits, this sunscreen harnesses nature's potent hydration.
Grown under abundant sunshine and rainfall, fruits like papaya, guava, mangosteen, noni, banana, mango, and pineapple pack a concentrated dose of vitamins and energy, revitalizing your skin and enhancing its natural glow.

Point3 - Long lasting
This sunscreen spreads like a luxurious lotion, absorbing swiftly and bonding seamlessly with your skin.
The result is a long-lasting dewy finish that keeps your skin feeling fresh and nourished throughout the day.

reviews.title: It’s okay
reviews.content: Not my favorite sunscreen there are better options out there! It’s lightweight my only concern is the smell that it has a scent similar to oranges and it may not be the best for sensitive skin!

reviews.title: Favorite sunscreen
reviews.content: Lightweight, non-greasy, and perfect for daily use. Absorbs fast, no white cast, and keeps my skin protected all day. My new favorite sunscreen!

reviews.title: Favorite sunscreen
reviews.content: Lightweight, non-greasy, and perfect for daily use. Absorbs fast, no white cast, and keeps my skin protected all day. My new favorite sunscreen!

reviews.title: OKAY
reviews.content: I gave this sunscreen a shot after hearing some buzz, and while it's not bad, it doesn't quite hit the mark like my beloved Numbuzin No.1 Clear Filter Sun Essence. This one offers solid SPF protection and doesn't leave a white cast, which is great. The texture is lightweight and absorbs fairly well, making it suitable for daily use. However, I noticed that it doesn't provide the same level of hydration and calming effect that Numbuzin does. My skin felt a bit drier by midday, and it didn't have that soothing finish I love. Also, the scent is a tad stronger than I'd prefer. Overall, it's a decent sunscreen that does its job, but if you're looking for that extra glow and comfort, Numbuzin still holds the crown for me.

description:
Description

MULTI-FUNCTIONAL - Sunscreen can be for more than just UV protection - formulated with Beta-Glucan, Centella Asiatica, Adenosine, & Niacinamide, Centella Calming Daily Sunscreen helps Moisturize, Soothe, Hydrate, & Glow up your skin while protecting it from UV damage! Provides strong SPF 50+ PA++++ protection against the UV rays, while also helping to keep skin moisturized instead of stripping it away.
UVA AND UVB COVERAGE - Protection from the Sun is serious stuff. Like what we said above, this cream provides SPF 50+ PA++++, a very strong protection rating, against the sun's UV rays when used properly. Great stuff.
SOFT TEXTURE, EASY APPLICATION - The texture of this is similar to a very, very soft gel that goes on very easily without leaving behind a greasy feeling. Absorbs great, works great, no fuss!
NO WHITE CAST NO SCENT NO STICKY NO GREASY NO OILY - IUNIK Centella Daily sunscreen that leaves NO WHITE CAST and dries down well, making it ideal for makeup afterwards! Chemical sunscreens often have a naturally-occurring unpleasant smell, but we made sure to rid of it with no harmful or allergic ingredients! Centella Calming Daily Sunscreen has a scent that’s barely there that you won’t even notice!
REEF-SAFE & GREAT FOR ALL SKIN TYPES - Formulated and has undergone clinical trials to ensure that this product is a solid choice for almost anyone, including those with sensitive dry and oily skin.
 
How To Use
Use as the last step in skincare routine. Apply an appropriate amount to the skin. 

Apply evenly to skin exposed to UV rays, avoiding eye area.

Gently pat and blend the sunscreen into your skin until fully absorbed. Reapply every 2 hours for optimal sun protection throughout the day.
 
Key Ingredients
Centella Asiatica Extract(49%), Water, Dibutyl Adipate, Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate, Ethylhexyl Triazone, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Methylene Bis-Benzotriazolyl Tetramethylbutylphenol, Polysilicone-15, 1,2-Hexanediol, Beta-Glucan, Allantoin, Butylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Arachidyl Alcohol, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Polyglyceryl-3 Methylglucose Distearate, Sorbitan Sesquioleate, Behenyl Alcohol, Decyl Glucoside, Caprylyl Glycol, Arachidyl Glucoside, Hydroxyacetophenone, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Carbomer, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Adenosine, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Glucose, t-Butyl Alcohol, Xanthan Gum, Tromethamine, Disodium EDTA

reviews.title: Just no
reviews.content: I was genuinely excited to try this sunscreen, as I’m a big fan of the brand. However, I was disappointed to find that it leaves a noticeable white cast, which doesn’t blend away easily—especially when applying the recommended amount using the two-finger rule. That said, the formula itself is impressive for those with oily skin, as it delivers a beautiful semi-matte finish that controls shine effectively. While it doesn’t offer much in terms of soothing or hydration (which my skin could have used, as it’s not oily), it’s clear that this product excels at catering to oilier skin types. It’s a bit of a mixed bag, but it has its strengths.

product_name: Colored Keyth Pink Desert Sun Serum 50ml
description:
Description

A skincare-infused hydrating sun serum with UV capsules that burst upon application, providing powerful protection against UV rays.

This serum features a moisture-rich texture that absorbs smoothly into the skin, representing the next generation of sun care developed with advanced technology.

It helps prevent irritation caused by UV exposure and aids in soothing the skin after sun exposure.

Clinically tested and formulated to be gentle on the skin, this low-irritant product comes in a slim and compact sleek design.

The transparent serum applies smoothly without leaving any white cast, delivering hydrating sun care.

The ingredients encapsulated within the capsules dissolve effortlessly, blocking UVA and UVB rays, and creating an invisible barrier to protect the skin from UV damage.

Enriched with components from pink yeast, a resilient organism that survives in the world's oldest and driest desert—the Atacama Desert—this serum offers moisturizing, soothing, and anti-aging benefits, as well as protection against heat- and light-induced oxidation.

description:
*Shipping Restriction Notice* Due to U.S. regulations concerning sunscreen products, the purchase of Beauty of Joseon Sunscreen is temporarily unavailable for customers in the United States. We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding. Sales will resume once the regulatory issues are resolved. 
Description

For those who loved our Relief Sun but found it a bit too rich, introducing Relief Sun Aqua-fresh. This new formula is crafted with rice seed water and panthenol to deliver refreshing hydration while safeguarding your skin from harmful UV rays and environmental stressors. Designed for those who prefer a sheer, non-greasy finish, Relief Sun Aqua-fresh provides the same benefits as the original Relief Sun—no white cast, no stickiness—plus enhanced hydration and a quick-absorbing, dewy finish.

- Lightweight, Hydrating Protection

- No White Cast, No Greasiness

- Ideal for All Skin Types

Relief Sun Aqua Fresh offers lightweight, non-greasy sun protection with rice seed water and panthenol. It hydrates while shielding your skin from UV rays, providing a fresh, dewy complexion with a quick-absorbing finish, perfect for daily use.
Used since ancient times for its skin benefits, rice seed water is packed with vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants. It helps to restore the skin's natural radiance, leaving it clear, vibrant, and healthy.
Known for its excellent moisturizing and skin-soothing properties, Panthenol (Vitamin B5) helps strengthen the skin's moisture barrier and soothe tired skin exposed to UV rays and external irritants.

How To Use

Apply evenly to your face, body, or any other areas that need sun protection before sun exposure.
Reapply every 2-3 hours, especially after sweating, swimming, or towel drying.

Sun Serum: Korean sunscreens are top tier and this one is is the best I’ve tried. I suffer from combination/dry skin that is also prone to redness. This leaves no white cast and does not make my t-zone oily/shiny even in warmer temperatures. So far I have had no breakouts from it or allergic reaction. The texture of this serum sunscreen is really light and runny, not thick at all. Goes on smoothly and makes skin feel silky and protected. Also doesn't burn my eyes and gives me a nice moisturized glow :)

product_name: Black Bamboo Daily Soothing Sun Shield
description:
Description

- A white-cast free vegan chemical sun stick with broad spectrum SPF50+ PA++++ to provide UVA and UVB protection to shield skin from sunburn, early aging and environmental stress.
- Formulated with patented fermented bamboo shoot extract and Ecotin to deliver nourishment and hydration to skin, while replenishing skin barrier.
- Further contains Niacinamide and Adenosine to lock moisture in skin, while giving a glowing complexion.
- A soft and powdery balm that gives a semi-matte and cooling finish without greasiness and dragging of skincare or makeup underneath.
- A reef-safe sunscreen that does not contain Oxybenzone and Octinoxate, known to be harmful to ocean.
- Skin irritation tested completed, suitable for sensitive skin.
- Free of potentially harmful ingredients such as GMO's, Sulfates and drying alcohol.
How To Use
1. At the last step of your skincare routine, twist the base to expose about 0.5cm of the stick and swipe it thoroughly across any exposed skin, like face, neck and shoulder.
2. Carry around this portable sun stick with you and reapply every 2 hours for optimal protection.

Water, Dibutyl Adipate, Synthetic Wax, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Caprylyl Trimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Propylheptyl Caprylate, Diethylamino Hydroxybenzoyl Hexyl Benzoate, Isododecane, Bis-Ethylhexyloxyphenol Methoxyphenyl Triazine, Caprylyl Methicone, Ethylhexyl Triazone, Polysilicone-15, Ceresin, Camellia Japonica Seed Oil, Diphenylsiloxy Phenyl Trimethicone, Niacinamide, Polyglyceryl-3 Polyricinoleate, Lauryl Polyglyceryl-3 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Dimethicone/Vinyl Dimethicone Crosspolymer, Sodium Chloride, 1,2-Hexanediol, Polyglyceryl-4 Diisostearate/Polyhydroxystearate/Sebacate, Vinyl Dimethicone/Methicone Silsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Glyceryl Caprylate, Phyllostachys Nigra Leaf Extract, Phyllostachys Pubescens Shoot Bark Extract, Adenosine, Aspergillus Ferment, Tocopherol, Dipropylene Glycol, Pentylene Glycol, Bambusa Vulgaris Water, Betaine, Ectoin, Panthenol

A comforting sunscreen that provides secure protection against UV rays all year round, featuring our Special Biome Blend to protect the skin barrier from UV rays.  Additionally Cranberry extract, which contains more than 95% of purified bio-peptides extracted from cranberries, helps to improve skin elasticity. How To Use

reviews.title: [make p:rem] UV Defense Me Daily Sun Fluid 150ml
reviews.content: I’ve been using this sunscreen on my hands and am loving it. The formula isn’t so thin that it’s runny, but also not thick. It’s a nice between. I hate the feeling of any kind of lotion on my palms, so instead I squeeze a bit onto the back of my hands and then rub them together that way. This sunscreen leaves my hands looking shiny but without that greasy feeling. There’s also no scent to this sunscreen which is nice. The best thing about this sunscreen is that it doesn’t leave a whitecast. I’m super pale but can still see when a sunscreen leaves a whitecast, and this one doesn’t. It blends into my skin perfectly even as I reapply multiple times throughout the day.

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.content: Relief Sun – My Skin-Loving Sunscreen I’ve been using the Relief Sun, and it’s quickly become my go-to for daily sun protection! This organic sunscreen has a lightweight, creamy texture that feels just like a soft moisturizer, never sticky or heavy, even with multiple layers. product_name: Pure Block Natural Daily Sun Cream 50ml
description:
Description


UV blocking functional cosmetic/skin sensitivity test completed
No sticky or shiny finish, this daily sun cream keeps your skin matte and pleasant throughout the day
1. Stays matte all day
Soft and creamy consistency makes it easy to apply onto skin without harsh rubbing and keeps your skin looking fresh all day
2. Natural finish without whitecast
Adheres to skin without leaving a whitecast, does not get all over your clothes or hair
3. Mild formula comforts skin
Minimum amount of irritants keeps your skin feeling pleasant and comfortable

Suggested Use


1. At the last step of your skin care routine, apply needed amount and gently pat until full absorbed
2. Apply onto neck, arms, legs, and any other areas that might be exposed to the sun

product_name: All-Around Safe Block Waterproof Sun Milk SPF50+/PA+++70ml
description:
Description
Sun Protection that hydrates and nourishes skin. The Missha All Around Safe Block Waterproof Sun Milk provides the best broad-spectrum protection without any greasy residue or white cast. It refreshes the skin and dries to a soft matte finish, perfect under makeup. This Sun Milk is water resistant and stays in place during outdoor activities & watersports, even working against sweat and providing sebum control during those hot months when you need it most. 

Suggested Use
Shake 3-5 times before use. Apply appropriate amount (at least ¼ tsp) onto face at last step of basic skin care.
Pat lightly until fully absorbed.
Apply evenly onto neck, arms, and legs where sun exposure occurs.
Reapply as needed for long-term sun exposure. 
The FDA recommends reapplication of sun protection every 2 hours, or after 40 minutes of an activity involving water and/or producing sweat.

product_name: All-Around safe Block Soft Finish Sun Milk SPF50+/PA+++70ml
description:
Description
Sun Protection that hydrates and nourishes skin. The Missha All Around Safe Block Waterproof Sun Milk provides the best broad-spectrum protection without any greasy residue or white cast. It refreshes the skin and dries to a soft matte finish, perfect under makeup. This Sun Milk is water resistant and stays in place during outdoor activities & watersports, even working against sweat and providing sebum control during those hot months when you need it most. 

Suggested Use
Shake 3-5 times before use. Apply appropriate amount (at least ¼ tsp) onto face at last step of basic skin care.
Pat lightly until fully absorbed.
Apply evenly onto neck, arms, and legs where sun exposure occurs.
Reapply as needed for long-term sun exposure. 
The FDA recommends reapplication of sun protection every 2 hours, or after 40 minutes of an activity involving water and/or producing sweat.
